itemDisplayName: Create a Data Factory Pipeline with Copy and Hive activities
description: This template creates a data factory pipeline with Copy and HDInsight Hive activities.
summary: Create a data factory with one pipeline with the following sequence of activities: Copy -> HDInsight Hive -> Copy. The first copy activity copies the input file from an FTP server to an Azure blob. The HDInsight Hive activity runs hive script on an Azure HDInsight cluster to transform data. The last Copy activity copies the result from Hive processing to another Azure blob
